name: Intelligent Crazy People
slogan: Befriend high potentials at scale including billionaires and ivy-league researchers

team.title: Product Manager
team.name: Joshua Vantard
team.bioHtml:
• Product manager with 5 years experience
• Former software & growth engineer
• 3 degrees at 35th university worldwide

team.title: Strategy
team.name: Jessika Nilsson
team.bioHtml: CEO of Safarisource. Strategy @ Intelligent Crazy People. PHD Anthropology, MSc Economics, MA Development Studies.

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer
jobs.description:
Who you are and what you'll do - 

We are looking for passionate engineers to join our team and help take our community to the next level. We're building a noiseless professional network out of ICP. Our community includes former founders and CEOs of Reddit, Skype, Notion, Zoom. We have 2200 members, ~8500 applications, ~100 meetups including house parties and 70%. Members Google and Facebook engineers to $ billion founders. You'll begin by helping us stabilise our existing product to handle ~50,000 users, before a rebuild to handle ~1 million+ users.

See more at www.intelligentcrazypeople.com  
Soon moved to icp.community

Perks -

• A bonus of 50-100% including revenue and performance on top of salary
• Competitive salary for your region - note the salary listed is annual
• Work from wherever you wish

You have: -

• Good English and communication skills (4/5).
• Good stable internet connection (at least 10mbps).
• Strong abstract reasoning skills and a scientific mindset.
• Ability to take initiative in qa, documentation, code, comments.
• Strong ability in Javascript, NodeJS, ReactJS.

Desired -

• Experience with UI/UX
• Knowledge of Redis, MongoDB and Heroku

If this isn't you - 

• We offer a 5% of yearly salary referral bonus to anyone we hire
• Still get in touch and we'll pass you on as a candidate to other ICPs

You'll also lead a team of remote engineers.

See more at www.intelligentcrazypeople.com  
Soon moved to icp.community, feel free to apply

• Knowledge of Redis, MongoDB and Heroku.

If this isn't you - 

• We offer a 5% of yearly salary referral bonus to anyone we hire.
• Still get in touch and we'll pass you on as a candidate to other ICPs.

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer
jobs.description:
Who you are:

We are looking for passionate Full Stack Developers to join our team and help take our community to the next level! We've built a beautiful directory app, with a new set of features, serving soon 1200 high value users from ex Google and Facebook engineers to $ billion founders. You'll begin by helping us stabilise our existing product before rolling out messaging and sponsored messaging. 

You will:

• Work with your co founder to convert designs into MVP level code
• Gain a deep understanding of how our customers use the product
• Work in sync with a team of 3 other engineers and a product manager

Perks:

• Competitive salary for your region - note the salary listed is annual
• Work from wherever you wish
• A 3 monthly pay rise of 25-50%, and annual pay rise of up to 5x.
• Opportunity to meet and work with our members all over the world

You have: 

• Good engineering experience in Javascript, ReactJS, NodeJS
• Ability to implement responsive design and site speed optimisation
• Excellent problem solving skills 
• Good English and communication skills (4/5).
• Good stable internet connection (at least 10mbps).

Desired:

• Experience with UI/UX
• Knowledge of Redis, MongoDB and Heroku

jobs.title: Lead Engineer
jobs.description:
Who you are:

We are looking for a passionate team lead to join our team and help take our community to the next level. We're building a noiseless professional network out of ICP. Our community includes former founders and CEOs of Reddit, Skype, Notion, Zoom. We have 2200 members, ~8500 applications, ~100 meetups including house parties and 70%. Members Google and Facebook engineers to $ billion founders. You'll begin by helping us stabilise our existing product to handle ~50,000 users, before a rebuild to handle ~1 million+ users.

Perks:

• Bonus 50-100% including revenue and performance on top of salary.
• You will become our VP Engineering and lead a team.
• Be one of the first members of our in-person team.
• Opportunity to meet and work with our members all over the world

You have: 

• Good engineering experience in Javascript, NodeJS, MongoDB
• Ability to managa team of 3 engineers with good documentation, processes, accountability in an agile way.
• Ability to implement responsive design and site speed optimisation
• Excellent problem solving skills and abstract thinking.

Desired:

• Experience with UI/UX
• Some academic background in computer science, engineering, mathematics or another science.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Who you are:

We are looking for a passionate team lead to join our team and help take our community to the next level. We're building a noiseless professional network out of ICP. Our community includes former founders and CEOs of Reddit, Skype, Notion, Zoom. We have 2200 members, ~8500 applications, ~100 meetups including house parties and 70%. You have:

• Good engineering experience in Javascript, NodeJS, MongoDB
• Ability to managa team of 3 engineers with good documentation, processes, accountability in an agile way.
• Ability to implement responsive design and site speed optimisation
• Excellent problem solving skills and abstract thinking.

Desired:

• Experience with UI/UX
• Some academic background in computer science, engineering, mathematics or another science.
